title: It's well doneeee but...
review: I sort of like the non clown parts better...like it could have been amazing as a coming of age movie without the horror...that said I liked it. It's artsy and pretty and kind of good and then not....I liked it...just didn't love it

title: Quite unique even years later
review: I enjoyed it and it didn't feel too long at all. A lot of truths here and my favorite is, 'what is an oven but a multitude of drops?' When told he was going to just be a drop in the bucket.
